channel.title: Cointelegraph.com News
channel.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest news and analyses on the future of money.

image.title: Cointelegraph.com News
image.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest news and analyses on the future of money.

item.title: China’s digital yuan gets smart contract functionality alongside new use cases
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Jesse Coghlan
item.description: China's central bank digital currency (CBDC) has seen new use cases in recent days, including buying securities and making offline payments.

item.title: Opinion: Bots are a critical tool for retail investors
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Bill Xing
item.description: Bots help remove emotions from trading. Functions like these make them even more valuable for neophyte traders than for experts.

item.title: Samsung’s Bitcoin ETF, $700M bust, Coinbase exits Japan: Asia Express
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Zhiyuan Sun

item.title: Nexo agrees to $45M settlement with SEC and states over earn product
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Brayden Lindrea
item.description: The crypto lender didn’t admit or deny the findings from the SEC’s investigation despite agreeing to the settlement.

item.title: FTX-linked Moonstone bank to exit the crypto space
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Judith BannermanQuist
item.description: Following the collapse of FTX, the company has decided to rebrand and exit the crypto space.

item.title: New Hampshire gov releases report on blockchain following executive order
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: According to the commission, New Hampshire should work toward building a legal framework “for sound development of blockchain technologies and its applications.”

item.title: BIS proposes research model to study DeFi’s integration with TradFi and its risks
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: Bank for International Settlements researchers admired DeFi’s “competitive financial engineering” and made some highly technical aspects of DeFi somewhat more accessible.

item.title: Bullish crypto traders maintain the upper hand despite the total market cap rejecting at $1T
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Marcel Pechman
item.description: Former BitMEX CEO Arthur Hayes says catastrophe is coming for the crypto sector, but derivatives data shows bulls slowly taking control of the market.

item.title: Decentralized forex will reduce cost by as much as 80%: Report
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Blackstone
item.description: The researchers compared the average cost of remittances according to World Bank data with estimated costs of trading USDC and EUROC stablecoins at Uniswap.

item.title: OKX declares $7.5B in liquid assets in proof-of-reserves report
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Paula Pereira
item.description: According to blockchain analytics firm CryptoQuant, OKX has the largest clean asset reserves of all the major exchanges.

item.title: City of Busan to establish digital assets exchange: Report
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Zhiyuan Sun
item.description: The Busan Digital Asset Exchange Establishment Promotion Committee said it plans to create a functional exchange by the end of the year.

item.title: Bitcoin miner CleanSpark expands operations in Georgia
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Sam Bourgi
item.description: Some BTC miners have declared bankruptcy or sought financial aid to stay afloat. Others are finding unique ways to grow amid the bear market.

item.title: MatchBoxDAO launches esports experience for Web3 developers
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Judith BannermanQuist
item.description: The tournament, “0xMonaco: Battle of Titans,” is scheduled to kick off on Jan. 29 and will bring together developers from around the blockchain space.

item.title: Data suggests Avalanche’s (AVAX) rally was a buy the rumor, sell the news event
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Nivesh Rustgi
item.description: AVAX price rallied after announcing news of an Amazon cloud integration, but does the news do anything to improve Avalanche’s fundamentals?

item.title: FTX CEO says he is exploring rebooting the exchange: Report
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: FTX Trading, doing business as FTX.com, was one of roughly 130 companies under FTX Group that filed for bankruptcy following the firm's reported liquidity crunch in November.

item.title: DeFi problems and opportunities in 2023: Market Talks
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Adrian J. Permal
item.description: Join us as we discuss decentralized finance, how it performed in 2022, and what its potential is in 2023.

item.title: Bitcoin price corrected, but bulls are positioned to profit in Friday’s $580M BTC options expiry
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Marcel Pechman
item.description: Reduced inflationary pressure fueled crypto investors’ appetite for risk markets, eliminating the possibility of bears profiting from the $580 million Bitcoin options expiry on Jan. 20.

item.title: Binance tightens rules on NFT listings
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Zhiyuan Sun
item.description: The exchange will delist NFTs with low trading volume that were listed prior to new KYC rules starting in February.

item.title: Bitcoin faces $15K crash as US sparks ‘financial meltdown’ — Arthur Hayes
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: Bitcoin will be just one of the risk assets that “crater” as the Federal Reserve is forced to abandon quantitative tightening in future, the ex-BitMEX CEO warns.

item.title: 6 ways the stablecoin space can improve stability in volatile periods
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Cointelegraph Innovation Circle
item.description: Tightening reserves and offering real-time pricing data to the market are among the ways the stablecoin space could better weather volatility.

item.title: How to prevent AI from ‘annihilating humanity’ using blockchain
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Andrew Fenton

item.title: Ava Labs and Amazon’s partnership could ‘expand the pie’ for blockchain
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Andrew Singer
item.description: The collaboration will allow both individuals and institutions to launch subnets that can operate as self-sufficient blockchain systems.

item.title: What are hierarchical deterministic (HD) crypto wallets?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Onkar Singh
item.description: A hierarchical deterministic wallet uses a single seed to create an infinite number of addresses, allowing users to recover funds using a master key.

item.title: SSV launches $50M ecosystem fund to support ETH staking tech
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Sam Bourgi
item.description: Vitalik Buterin identified distributed validator technology, or DVT, as a key component of Ethereum’s decentralization efforts.

item.title: 1inch launches proprietary hardware wallet as self-custody trend grows
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Helen Partz
item.description: 1inch Networks’ upcoming hardware wallet has no direct connection to the internet and doesn’t require any wired connection.

item.title: Expect better blockchain games in 2023, says Animoca Brands CEO
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Elisha Owusu Akyaw
item.description: Animoca Brands CEO Robby Yung believes we will see many great blockchain games released during the first nine months of 2023 as developers begin to deliver after raising funds in 2022.

item.title: Metaverse to bring ‘true productivity’ to industrial environments: Davos 2023
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Savannah Fortis
item.description: A panel of experts at the 2023 World Economic Forum highlighted how the metaverse could deliver practical use cases of large-scale industrial industries like healthcare and retail.

item.title: Complaint filed against Compass Mining for losing BTC mining machines hits snag
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ciaran Lyons
item.description: The lawsuit alleged that Compass Mining didn’t disclose to Bit River that it was only the "middleman," not the owner of its customers’ machines.

item.title: Raydium exploiter moves $2.7M to crypto mixer Tornado Cash
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ezra Reguerra
item.description: The hackers sent 1,774.5 Ether to the sanctioned cryptocurrency mixer weeks after the DeFi protocol exploit.

item.title: Bitcoin can pass $30K before setting new bear market low — forecast
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: Elliott Wave analysis from QCP Capital suggests that the Bitcoin price bottom is not yet in.
